attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To disable nuclear options leaves leaders calling conflict free of the fear of that cataclysmal backlash against their personal well being, so tending to encourage an ongoing tradition of humanity to pursue and glorify war.
Regarding asymmetric conflict:- a good DNA database should show which population clusters need be targeted to appropriately apply deterrence in fashions not of collective but mutual punishment for responsibility for kindred actions.
